API_Description: Retrieves the index object at the specified position in the list of available indexes.
API_Description_Reason: The method name 'getNthIndex' suggests it retrieves an index from a collection based on its position, which is a common pattern for such methods.
Returns: The Index object at the specified position.
Returns_Reason: The method likely returns an Index object because it is part of the search functionality, which deals with indexes, and the method name implies retrieval of an index.

unknown.description: The 0-based position of the index to retrieve from the list of available indexes.
